modName: Alex - Imperial Preset for ECE and RaceMenu
summary: An Imperial Preset for ECE and RaceMenu.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]My Preset for RaceMenu and ECE.

[u]Backstory[/u]
[i]Alex was a happy little girl, even after her mother passed away during the birth of her sister Anne. Growing up she became used to her father returning home late, a strong scent of mead following him. They barely had enough coin to feed themselves, let alone buy alcohol to feed their fathers unhealthy habit! When Alex was 11 and her sister 9, their father met a young redguard named Iran. She quickly took control of their father, later having a daughter named Kara. Iran then manipulated him to leave his daughters to live a new life in Hammerfell with her. With nothing left but the clothes on their back, Alex and Anne were forced onto the streets. 12 years later, Alex decides that she will live up to her full potential and join the Imperial legion. However her sister Anne disagreed. They say their goodbyes on good terms and they go their separate ways. [b]That's where you come in![/b][/i]

Mods Required:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's Renewal[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/?]Coverwoman (look 2)[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Brows[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?]Showracemenu Precache Killer[/url]

Recommended Mods:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body (NSFW)[/url]

Mods used in screenshots:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB [/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18272/?]aMidianBorn Steel Armor Retexture[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48077/?]Selene Armor[/url]

Installation for RaceMenu:
Extract the 'alexhead' files into Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen.
Then extract 'alexpreset.jslot' to Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets.
Open up the racemenu with the console command 'showracemenu'.
Select the Imperial race.
Go into the presets tab and select 'alexpreset'.
Go to the sculpt tab and press import head, then select 'alexhead'.

Installation for ECE
Extract '_16_commonTriraces.jslot' to Documents/My Games/Skyrim/CME_Save.
Open up the racemenu with the console command 'showracemenu'.
Select the Imperial Race.
Go into the body tab and select slot load.
Load slot 16.

Enjoy! :)

Credits:

neovinci for the Selene Armor
EcthelionOtW for Seductive Lips
CaBal120 for aMidianBorn Steel Armor Retexture

[size=4]I'd love to see your screenshots of Alex, so post away![/size][/center][center][size=4]
[/size][/center]
author: brella2002
